  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:fizleti/120353</entry>

          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:fizleti/120353</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Predstavitve harmoničnega gibanja</string>
            <string language="en">Representations of Simple Harmonic Motion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Darstellungen der einfachen harmonischen 
Bewegung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Représentations de mouvement harmonique simple</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Respresentações do movimento harmonic simples</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Rappresentazioni di movimento armonico semplice</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αντιπροσωπεύσεις της απλής αρμονικής κίνησης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Representaciones del movimiento armónico simple</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Demonstracija harmoničnega gibanja na primeru nihanja vzmeti in kroženja.</string>
            <string language="en">Demonstration of harmonic motion in case of a spring oscillation and rotation.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">harmonično nihanje</string>
            <string language="en">harmonic motion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">periodično gibanje</string>
            <string language="en">periodic motion</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Demonstration der harmonischen Bewegung falls von
einer Frühling Pendelbewegung und einer Umdrehung.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Démonstration de mouvement harmonique en cas 
d'oscillation et de rotation de ressort.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Demonstração do movimento harmonic caso que de 
uma oscilação e de uma rotação da mola.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Dimostrazione di movimento armonico nel caso di 
un'oscillazione e di una rotazione della molla.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επίδειξη της αρμονικής κίνησης σε περίπτωση 
ταλάντωσης και περιστροφής άνοιξη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Demostración del movimiento armónico en caso de
que de una oscilación y de una rotación del resorte.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">harmonische Bewegung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">periodische Bewegung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">mouvement harmonique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">mouvement périodique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">movimento harmonic</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">movimento periódico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">movimento armonico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">movimento periodico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αρμονική κίνηση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">περιοδική κίνηση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">movimiento armónico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">movimiento periódico</string>
          </keyword>
